ygData.subject: Re: Everquest Spoilers Update
ygData.msgSnippet: In any case that any of these actually worked without the use of a spell (I mean really fly through the air, whats to say the tip isn t just buy a ring of
ygData.messageBody:
In any case that any of these actually worked without the use of a
spell (I mean really fly through the air, whats to say the "tip"
isn't just buy a ring of levitation, find a high part to start and
run off) then the other possiblities is they are hacks or they are
random pathing issues, or they are basically just fancy use of hot
keys.

This is the *same person* who was previously selling a guide on how
to make plat (one I bought when I first started playing because I
was young and stupid then)- it basically was a bunch of quests I
could find on Allakazam that were repeatable and "tips" like kill
things and sell the items to players.

In all cases, every guide like this in the past has been filled with
out dated, in accurate, or information that is not always
repeatable.

An exploit of a bug is only useful if you can consistently repeat it.

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Wulfric Rennison" <wulftech@e...>
wrote:
> Where on any of this site do you see those as "spoilers"? I don't
know abotu you but the website I went to was advertising an EQ
secrets manual that you can download for $20. And some of the
things you list in your spoilers sound more like hacks than things
SOE is planning on implementing. So not to deter anyone from buying
this download, but I'd be very careful and double check to make sure
the things listed are legal and not going to get your account
revoked.
>
>
> Wulfric
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Craig Baldwin
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Friday, August 13, 2004 7:50 PM
> Subject: [EverQuest] Everquest Spoilers Update
>
>
> Sending a heads up on over 30 new spoilers of Everquest at
>
> http://eq.onlinegamingstrategies.com
>
> Fly: You can fly through the air in any direction like it is
water.
> Walk through doors and up walls: You no longer need any keys
again.
> Unsummonable: Make yourself unable to be summoned by enemy mobs.
> Speed Changing: Change your speed from SOW to 5X max SOW.
> Anti-Encumber: Never slow down from being overweight.
> Fall with no damage: Prevent damage from falling.
> Infinite Air: Why use a Fishbone Earring when you have this?
> See Invisible: This allows you to see all invisible mobs.
> Infravision: Weak human eyes? See like a dark elf
> Prevent Weather: Tired of the rain in Greater Faydark? Now you
can
> stop it!
> Hide, sneak, and pickpocket while attacking: The name says it
all.
> Hide and run: Be able to run and use your hide skill at the same
> time.
> Beg while invisible and attacking: As the name says.
>
>
>
> http://eq.onlinegamingstrategies.com
>
>
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
>
>
